issue.title: [Rust] Use slice instead of &Vec for function arguments
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8730](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8730). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It is best practice to use slice instead of &Vec for function arguments

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8730?focusedCommentId=17102524) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7125
